03234                 switch (source.type())
03235                 {
03236                 case node_element:
03237                 {
03238                         dest.set_name(source.name());
03239 
03240                         for (xml_attribute a = source.first_attribute(); a; a = a.next_attribute())
03241                                 dest.append_attribute(a.name()).set_value(a.value());
03242 
03243                         for (xml_node c = source.first_child(); c; c = c.next_sibling())
03244                         {
03245                                 if (c == skip) continue;
03246 
03247                                 xml_node cc = dest.append_child(c.type());
03248                                 assert(cc);
03249 
03250                                 recursive_copy_skip(cc, c, skip);
03251                         }
03252 
03253                         break;
03254                 }
03255 
03256                 case node_pcdata:
03257                 case node_cdata:
03258                 case node_comment:
03259                 case node_doctype:
03260                         dest.set_value(source.value());
03261                         break;
03262 
03263                 case node_pi:
03264                         dest.set_name(source.name());
03265                         dest.set_value(source.value());
03266                         break;
03267 
03268                 case node_declaration:
03269                 {
03270                         dest.set_name(source.name());
03271 
03272                         for (xml_attribute a = source.first_attribute(); a; a = a.next_attribute())
03273                                 dest.append_attribute(a.name()).set_value(a.value());
03274 
03275                         break;
03276                 }
03277 
03278                 default:
03279                         assert(!"Invalid node type");
03280                 }
03281         }
03282 
03283         inline bool is_text_node(xml_node_struct* node)
03284         {
03285                 xml_node_type type = static_cast<xml_node_type>((node->header & impl::xml_memory_page_type_mask) + 1);
03286 
03287                 return type == node_pcdata || type == node_cdata;
03288         }
03289 
03290         // get value with conversion functions
03291         PUGI__FN int get_value_int(const char_t* value, int def)
03292         {
03293                 if (!value) return def;
03294 
03295         #ifdef PUGIXML_WCHAR_MODE
03296                 return static_cast<int>(wcstol(value, 0, 10));
03297         #else
03298                 return static_cast<int>(strtol(value, 0, 10));
03299         #endif
03300         }
03301 
03302         PUGI__FN unsigned int get_value_uint(const char_t* value, unsigned int def)
03303         {
03304                 if (!value) return def;
03305 
03306         #ifdef PUGIXML_WCHAR_MODE
03307                 return static_cast<unsigned int>(wcstoul(value, 0, 10));
03308         #else
03309                 return static_cast<unsigned int>(strtoul(value, 0, 10));
03310         #endif
03311         }
03312 
03313         PUGI__FN double get_value_double(const char_t* value, double def)
03314         {
03315                 if (!value) return def;
03316 
03317         #ifdef PUGIXML_WCHAR_MODE
03318                 return wcstod(value, 0);
03319         #else
03320                 return strtod(value, 0);
03321         #endif
03322         }
03323 
03324         PUGI__FN float get_value_float(const char_t* value, float def)
03325         {
03326                 if (!value) return def;
03327 
03328         #ifdef PUGIXML_WCHAR_MODE
03329                 return static_cast<float>(wcstod(value, 0));
03330         #else
03331                 return static_cast<float>(strtod(value, 0));
03332         #endif
03333         }
03334 
03335         PUGI__FN bool get_value_bool(const char_t* value, bool def)
03336         {
03337                 if (!value) return def;
03338 
03339                 // only look at first char
03340                 char_t first = *value;
03341 
03342                 // 1*, t* (true), T* (True), y* (yes), Y* (YES)
03343                 return (first == '1' || first == 't' || first == 'T' || first == 'y' || first == 'Y');
03344         }
03345 
03346         // set value with conversion functions
03347         PUGI__FN bool set_value_buffer(char_t*& dest, uintptr_t& header, uintptr_t header_mask, char (&buf)[128])
03348         {
03349         #ifdef PUGIXML_WCHAR_MODE
03350                 char_t wbuf[128];
03351                 impl::widen_ascii(wbuf, buf);
03352 
03353                 return strcpy_insitu(dest, header, header_mask, wbuf);
03354         #else
03355                 return strcpy_insitu(dest, header, header_mask, buf);
03356         #endif
03357         }
03358 
03359         PUGI__FN bool set_value_convert(char_t*& dest, uintptr_t& header, uintptr_t header_mask, int value)
03360         {
03361                 char buf[128];
03362                 sprintf(buf, "%d", value);
03363         
03364                 return set_value_buffer(dest, header, header_mask, buf);
03365         }
03366 
03367         PUGI__FN bool set_value_convert(char_t*& dest, uintptr_t& header, uintptr_t header_mask, unsigned int value)
03368         {
03369                 char buf[128];
03370                 sprintf(buf, "%u", value);
03371 
03372                 return set_value_buffer(dest, header, header_mask, buf);
03373         }
03374 
03375         PUGI__FN bool set_value_convert(char_t*& dest, uintptr_t& header, uintptr_t header_mask, double value)
03376         {
03377                 char buf[128];
03378                 sprintf(buf, "%g", value);
03379 
03380                 return set_value_buffer(dest, header, header_mask, buf);
03381         }
03382         
03383         PUGI__FN bool set_value_convert(char_t*& dest, uintptr_t& header, uintptr_t header_mask, bool value)
03384         {
03385                 return strcpy_insitu(dest, header, header_mask, value ? PUGIXML_TEXT("true") : PUGIXML_TEXT("false"));
03386         }
03387 
03388         // we need to get length of entire file to load it in memory; the only (relatively) sane way to do it is via seek/tell trick
03389         PUGI__FN xml_parse_status get_file_size(FILE* file, size_t& out_result)
03390         {
03391         #if defined(PUGI__MSVC_CRT_VERSION) && PUGI__MSVC_CRT_VERSION >= 1400 && !defined(_WIN32_WCE)
03392                 // there are 64-bit versions of fseek/ftell, let's use them
03393                 typedef __int64 length_type;
03394 
03395                 _fseeki64(file, 0, SEEK_END);
03396                 length_type length = _ftelli64(file);
03397                 _fseeki64(file, 0, SEEK_SET);
03398         #elif defined(__MINGW32__) && !defined(__NO_MINGW_LFS) && !defined(__STRICT_ANSI__)
03399                 // there are 64-bit versions of fseek/ftell, let's use them
03400                 typedef off64_t length_type;
03401 
03402                 fseeko64(file, 0, SEEK_END);
03403                 length_type length = ftello64(file);
03404                 fseeko64(file, 0, SEEK_SET);
03405         #else
03406                 // if this is a 32-bit OS, long is enough; if this is a unix system, long is 64-bit, which is enough; otherwise we can't do anything anyway.
03407                 typedef long length_type;
03408 
03409                 fseek(file, 0, SEEK_END);
03410                 length_type length = ftell(file);
03411                 fseek(file, 0, SEEK_SET);
03412         #endif
03413 
03414                 // check for I/O errors
03415                 if (length < 0) return status_io_error;
03416                 
03417                 // check for overflow
03418                 size_t result = static_cast<size_t>(length);
03419 
03420                 if (static_cast<length_type>(result) != length) return status_out_of_memory;
03421 
03422                 // finalize
03423                 out_result = result;
03424 
03425                 return status_ok;
03426         }
03427 
03428         PUGI__FN xml_parse_result load_file_impl(xml_document& doc, FILE* file, unsigned int options, xml_encoding encoding)
03429         {
03430                 if (!file) return make_parse_result(status_file_not_found);
03431 
03432                 // get file size (can result in I/O errors)
03433                 size_t size = 0;
03434                 xml_parse_status size_status = get_file_size(file, size);
03435 
03436                 if (size_status != status_ok)
03437                 {
03438                         fclose(file);
03439                         return make_parse_result(size_status);
03440                 }
03441                 
03442                 // allocate buffer for the whole file
03443                 char* contents = static_cast<char*>(xml_memory::allocate(size > 0 ? size : 1));
03444 
03445                 if (!contents)
03446                 {
03447                         fclose(file);
03448                         return make_parse_result(status_out_of_memory);
03449                 }
03450 
03451                 // read file in memory
03452                 size_t read_size = fread(contents, 1, size, file);
03453                 fclose(file);
03454 
03455                 if (read_size != size)
03456                 {
03457                         xml_memory::deallocate(contents);
03458                         return make_parse_result(status_io_error);
03459                 }
03460                 
03461                 return doc.load_buffer_inplace_own(contents, size, options, encoding);
03462         }
03463 
03464 #ifndef PUGIXML_NO_STL
03465         template <typename T> struct xml_stream_chunk
03466         {
03467                 static xml_stream_chunk* create()
03468                 {
03469                         void* memory = xml_memory::allocate(sizeof(xml_stream_chunk));
03470                         
03471                         return new (memory) xml_stream_chunk();
03472                 }
03473 
03474                 static void destroy(void* ptr)
03475                 {
03476                         xml_stream_chunk* chunk = static_cast<xml_stream_chunk*>(ptr);
03477 
03478                         // free chunk chain
03479                         while (chunk)
03480                         {
03481                                 xml_stream_chunk* next = chunk->next;
03482                                 xml_memory::deallocate(chunk);
03483                                 chunk = next;
03484                         }
03485                 }
03486 
03487                 xml_stream_chunk(): next(0), size(0)
03488                 {
03489                 }
03490 
03491                 xml_stream_chunk* next;
03492                 size_t size;
03493 
03494                 T data[xml_memory_page_size / sizeof(T)];
03495         };
03496 
03497         template <typename T> PUGI__FN xml_parse_status load_stream_data_noseek(std::basic_istream<T>& stream, void** out_buffer, size_t* out_size)
03498         {
03499                 buffer_holder chunks(0, xml_stream_chunk<T>::destroy);
03500 
03501                 // read file to a chunk list
03502                 size_t total = 0;
03503                 xml_stream_chunk<T>* last = 0;
03504 
03505                 while (!stream.eof())
03506                 {
03507                         // allocate new chunk
03508                         xml_stream_chunk<T>* chunk = xml_stream_chunk<T>::create();
03509                         if (!chunk) return status_out_of_memory;
03510 
03511                         // append chunk to list
03512                         if (last) last = last->next = chunk;
03513                         else chunks.data = last = chunk;
03514 
03515                         // read data to chunk
03516                         stream.read(chunk->data, static_cast<std::streamsize>(sizeof(chunk->data) / sizeof(T)));
03517                         chunk->size = static_cast<size_t>(stream.gcount()) * sizeof(T);
03518 
03519                         // read may set failbit | eofbit in case gcount() is less than read length, so check for other I/O errors
03520                         if (stream.bad() || (!stream.eof() && stream.fail())) return status_io_error;
03521 
03522                         // guard against huge files (chunk size is small enough to make this overflow check work)
03523                         if (total + chunk->size < total) return status_out_of_memory;
03524                         total += chunk->size;
03525                 }
03526 
03527                 // copy chunk list to a contiguous buffer
03528                 char* buffer = static_cast<char*>(xml_memory::allocate(total));
03529                 if (!buffer) return status_out_of_memory;
03530 
03531                 char* write = buffer;
03532 
03533                 for (xml_stream_chunk<T>* chunk = static_cast<xml_stream_chunk<T>*>(chunks.data); chunk; chunk = chunk->next)
03534                 {
03535                         assert(write + chunk->size <= buffer + total);
03536                         memcpy(write, chunk->data, chunk->size);
03537                         write += chunk->size;
03538                 }
03539 
03540                 assert(write == buffer + total);
03541 
03542                 // return buffer
03543                 *out_buffer = buffer;
03544                 *out_size = total;
03545 
03546                 return status_ok;
03547         }
03548 
03549         template <typename T> PUGI__FN xml_parse_status load_stream_data_seek(std::basic_istream<T>& stream, void** out_buffer, size_t* out_size)
03550         {
03551                 // get length of remaining data in stream
03552                 typename std::basic_istream<T>::pos_type pos = stream.tellg();
03553                 stream.seekg(0, std::ios::end);
03554                 std::streamoff length = stream.tellg() - pos;
03555                 stream.seekg(pos);
03556 
03557                 if (stream.fail() || pos < 0) return status_io_error;
03558 
03559                 // guard against huge files
03560                 size_t read_length = static_cast<size_t>(length);
03561 
03562                 if (static_cast<std::streamsize>(read_length) != length || length < 0) return status_out_of_memory;
03563 
03564                 // read stream data into memory (guard against stream exceptions with buffer holder)
03565                 buffer_holder buffer(xml_memory::allocate((read_length > 0 ? read_length : 1) * sizeof(T)), xml_memory::deallocate);
03566                 if (!buffer.data) return status_out_of_memory;
03567 
03568                 stream.read(static_cast<T*>(buffer.data), static_cast<std::streamsize>(read_length));
03569 
03570                 // read may set failbit | eofbit in case gcount() is less than read_length (i.e. line ending conversion), so check for other I/O errors
03571                 if (stream.bad() || (!stream.eof() && stream.fail())) return status_io_error;
03572 
03573                 // return buffer
03574                 size_t actual_length = static_cast<size_t>(stream.gcount());
03575                 assert(actual_length <= read_length);
03576 
03577                 *out_buffer = buffer.release();
03578                 *out_size = actual_length * sizeof(T);
03579 
03580                 return status_ok;
03581         }
03582 
03583         template <typename T> PUGI__FN xml_parse_result load_stream_impl(xml_document& doc, std::basic_istream<T>& stream, unsigned int options, xml_encoding encoding)
03584         {
03585                 void* buffer = 0;
03586                 size_t size = 0;
03587 
03588                 // load stream to memory (using seek-based implementation if possible, since it's faster and takes less memory)
03589                 xml_parse_status status = (stream.tellg() < 0) ? load_stream_data_noseek(stream, &buffer, &size) : load_stream_data_seek(stream, &buffer, &size);
03590                 if (status != status_ok) return make_parse_result(status);
03591 
03592                 return doc.load_buffer_inplace_own(buffer, size, options, encoding);
03593         }
03594 #endif
03595 
03596 #if defined(PUGI__MSVC_CRT_VERSION) || defined(__BORLANDC__) || (defined(__MINGW32__) && !defined(__STRICT_ANSI__))
03597         PUGI__FN FILE* open_file_wide(const wchar_t* path, const wchar_t* mode)
03598         {
03599                 return _wfopen(path, mode);
03600         }
03601 #else
03602         PUGI__FN char* convert_path_heap(const wchar_t* str)
03603         {
03604                 assert(str);
03605 
03606                 // first pass: get length in utf8 characters
03607                 size_t length = wcslen(str);
03608                 size_t size = as_utf8_begin(str, length);
03609 
03610                 // allocate resulting string
03611                 char* result = static_cast<char*>(xml_memory::allocate(size + 1));
03612                 if (!result) return 0;
03613 
03614                 // second pass: convert to utf8
03615                 as_utf8_end(result, size, str, length);
03616 
03617                 return result;
03618         }
03619 
03620         PUGI__FN FILE* open_file_wide(const wchar_t* path, const wchar_t* mode)
03621         {
03622                 // there is no standard function to open wide paths, so our best bet is to try utf8 path
03623                 char* path_utf8 = convert_path_heap(path);
03624                 if (!path_utf8) return 0;
03625 
03626                 // convert mode to ASCII (we mirror _wfopen interface)
03627                 char mode_ascii[4] = {0};
03628                 for (size_t i = 0; mode[i]; ++i) mode_ascii[i] = static_cast<char>(mode[i]);
03629 
03630                 // try to open the utf8 path
03631                 FILE* result = fopen(path_utf8, mode_ascii);
03632 
03633                 // free dummy buffer
03634                 xml_memory::deallocate(path_utf8);
03635 
03636                 return result;
03637         }
03638 #endif
03639 
03640         PUGI__FN bool save_file_impl(const xml_document& doc, FILE* file, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, xml_encoding encoding)
03641         {
03642                 if (!file) return false;
03643 
03644                 xml_writer_file writer(file);
03645                 doc.save(writer, indent, flags, encoding);
03646 
03647                 int result = ferror(file);
03648 
03649                 fclose(file);
03650 
03651                 return result == 0;
03652         }
03653 PUGI__NS_END
03654 
03655 namespace pugi
03656 {
03657         PUGI__FN xml_writer_file::xml_writer_file(void* file_): file(file_)
03658         {
03659         }
03660 
03661         PUGI__FN void xml_writer_file::write(const void* data, size_t size)
03662         {
03663                 size_t result = fwrite(data, 1, size, static_cast<FILE*>(file));
03664                 (void)!result; // unfortunately we can't do proper error handling here
03665         }
03666 
03667 #ifndef PUGIXML_NO_STL
03668         PUGI__FN xml_writer_stream::xml_writer_stream(std::basic_ostream<char, std::char_traits<char> >& stream): narrow_stream(&stream), wide_stream(0)
03669         {
03670         }
03671 
03672         PUGI__FN xml_writer_stream::xml_writer_stream(std::basic_ostream<wchar_t, std::char_traits<wchar_t> >& stream): narrow_stream(0), wide_stream(&stream)
03673         {
03674         }
03675 
03676         PUGI__FN void xml_writer_stream::write(const void* data, size_t size)
03677         {
03678                 if (narrow_stream)
03679                 {
03680                         assert(!wide_stream);
03681                         narrow_stream->write(reinterpret_cast<const char*>(data), static_cast<std::streamsize>(size));
03682                 }
03683                 else
03684                 {
03685                         assert(wide_stream);
03686                         assert(size % sizeof(wchar_t) == 0);
03687 
03688                         wide_stream->write(reinterpret_cast<const wchar_t*>(data), static_cast<std::streamsize>(size / sizeof(wchar_t)));
03689                 }
03690         }
03691 #endif
03692 
03693         PUGI__FN xml_tree_walker::xml_tree_walker(): _depth(0)
03694         {
03695         }
03696         
03697         PUGI__FN xml_tree_walker::~xml_tree_walker()
03698         {
03699         }
03700 
03701         PUGI__FN int xml_tree_walker::depth() const
03702         {
03703                 return _depth;
03704         }
03705 
03706         PUGI__FN bool xml_tree_walker::begin(xml_node&)
03707         {
03708                 return true;
03709         }
03710 
03711         PUGI__FN bool xml_tree_walker::end(xml_node&)
03712         {
03713                 return true;
03714         }
03715 
03716         PUGI__FN xml_attribute::xml_attribute(): _attr(0)
03717         {
03718         }
03719 
03720         PUGI__FN xml_attribute::xml_attribute(xml_attribute_struct* attr): _attr(attr)
03721         {
03722         }
03723 
03724         PUGI__FN static void unspecified_bool_xml_attribute(xml_attribute***)
03725         {
03726         }
03727 
03728         PUGI__FN xml_attribute::operator xml_attribute::unspecified_bool_type() const
03729         {
03730                 return _attr ? unspecified_bool_xml_attribute : 0;
03731         }
03732 
03733         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::operator!() const
03734         {
03735                 return !_attr;
03736         }
03737 
03738         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::operator==(const xml_attribute& r) const
03739         {
03740                 return (_attr == r._attr);
03741         }
03742         
03743         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::operator!=(const xml_attribute& r) const
03744         {
03745                 return (_attr != r._attr);
03746         }
03747 
03748         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::operator<(const xml_attribute& r) const
03749         {
03750                 return (_attr < r._attr);
03751         }
03752         
03753         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::operator>(const xml_attribute& r) const
03754         {
03755                 return (_attr > r._attr);
03756         }
03757         
03758         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::operator<=(const xml_attribute& r) const
03759         {
03760                 return (_attr <= r._attr);
03761         }
03762         
03763         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::operator>=(const xml_attribute& r) const
03764         {
03765                 return (_attr >= r._attr);
03766         }
03767 
03768         PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_attribute::next_attribute() const
03769         {
03770                 return _attr ? xml_attribute(_attr->next_attribute) : xml_attribute();
03771         }
03772 
03773         PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_attribute::previous_attribute() const
03774         {
03775                 return _attr && _attr->prev_attribute_c->next_attribute ? xml_attribute(_attr->prev_attribute_c) : xml_attribute();
03776         }
03777 
03778         PUGI__FN const char_t* xml_attribute::as_string(const char_t* def) const
03779         {
03780                 return (_attr && _attr->value) ? _attr->value : def;
03781         }
03782 
03783         PUGI__FN int xml_attribute::as_int(int def) const
03784         {
03785                 return impl::get_value_int(_attr ? _attr->value : 0, def);
03786         }
03787 
03788         PUGI__FN unsigned int xml_attribute::as_uint(unsigned int def) const
03789         {
03790                 return impl::get_value_uint(_attr ? _attr->value : 0, def);
03791         }
03792 
03793         PUGI__FN double xml_attribute::as_double(double def) const
03794         {
03795                 return impl::get_value_double(_attr ? _attr->value : 0, def);
03796         }
03797 
03798         PUGI__FN float xml_attribute::as_float(float def) const
03799         {
03800                 return impl::get_value_float(_attr ? _attr->value : 0, def);
03801         }
03802 
03803         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::as_bool(bool def) const
03804         {
03805                 return impl::get_value_bool(_attr ? _attr->value : 0, def);
03806         }
03807 
03808         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::empty() const
03809         {
03810                 return !_attr;
03811         }
03812 
03813         PUGI__FN const char_t* xml_attribute::name() const
03814         {
03815                 return (_attr && _attr->name) ? _attr->name : PUGIXML_TEXT("");
03816         }
03817 
03818         PUGI__FN const char_t* xml_attribute::value() const
03819         {
03820                 return (_attr && _attr->value) ? _attr->value : PUGIXML_TEXT("");
03821         }
03822 
03823         PUGI__FN size_t xml_attribute::hash_value() const
03824         {
03825                 return static_cast<size_t>(reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(_attr) / sizeof(xml_attribute_struct));
03826         }
03827 
03828         PUGI__FN xml_attribute_struct* xml_attribute::internal_object() const
03829         {
03830                 return _attr;
03831         }
03832 
03833         PUGI__FN xml_attribute& xml_attribute::operator=(const char_t* rhs)
03834         {
03835                 set_value(rhs);
03836                 return *this;
03837         }
03838         
03839         PUGI__FN xml_attribute& xml_attribute::operator=(int rhs)
03840         {
03841                 set_value(rhs);
03842                 return *this;
03843         }
03844 
03845         PUGI__FN xml_attribute& xml_attribute::operator=(unsigned int rhs)
03846         {
03847                 set_value(rhs);
03848                 return *this;
03849         }
03850 
03851         PUGI__FN xml_attribute& xml_attribute::operator=(double rhs)
03852         {
03853                 set_value(rhs);
03854                 return *this;
03855         }
03856         
03857         PUGI__FN xml_attribute& xml_attribute::operator=(bool rhs)
03858         {
03859                 set_value(rhs);
03860                 return *this;
03861         }
03862 
03863         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::set_name(const char_t* rhs)
03864         {
03865                 if (!_attr) return false;
03866                 
03867                 return impl::strcpy_insitu(_attr->name, _attr->header, impl::xml_memory_page_name_allocated_mask, rhs);
03868         }
03869                 
03870         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::set_value(const char_t* rhs)
03871         {
03872                 if (!_attr) return false;
03873 
03874                 return impl::strcpy_insitu(_attr->value, _attr->header, impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask, rhs);
03875         }
03876 
03877         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::set_value(int rhs)
03878         {
03879                 if (!_attr) return false;
03880 
03881                 return impl::set_value_convert(_attr->value, _attr->header, impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask, rhs);
03882         }
03883 
03884         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::set_value(unsigned int rhs)
03885         {
03886                 if (!_attr) return false;
03887 
03888                 return impl::set_value_convert(_attr->value, _attr->header, impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask, rhs);
03889         }
03890 
03891         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::set_value(double rhs)
03892         {
03893                 if (!_attr) return false;
03894 
03895                 return impl::set_value_convert(_attr->value, _attr->header, impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask, rhs);
03896         }
03897         
03898         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute::set_value(bool rhs)
03899         {
03900                 if (!_attr) return false;
03901 
03902                 return impl::set_value_convert(_attr->value, _attr->header, impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask, rhs);
03903         }
03904 
03905 #ifdef __BORLANDC__
03906         PUGI__FN bool operator&&(const xml_attribute& lhs, bool rhs)
03907         {
03908                 return (bool)lhs && rhs;
03909         }
03910 
03911         PUGI__FN bool operator||(const xml_attribute& lhs, bool rhs)
03912         {
03913                 return (bool)lhs || rhs;
03914         }
03915 #endif
03916 
03917         PUGI__FN xml_node::xml_node(): _root(0)
03918         {
03919         }
03920 
03921         PUGI__FN xml_node::xml_node(xml_node_struct* p): _root(p)
03922         {
03923         }
03924         
03925         PUGI__FN static void unspecified_bool_xml_node(xml_node***)
03926         {
03927         }
03928 
03929         PUGI__FN xml_node::operator xml_node::unspecified_bool_type() const
03930         {
03931                 return _root ? unspecified_bool_xml_node : 0;
03932         }
03933 
03934         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::operator!() const
03935         {
03936                 return !_root;
03937         }
03938 
03939         PUGI__FN xml_node::iterator xml_node::begin() const
03940         {
03941                 return iterator(_root ? _root->first_child : 0, _root);
03942         }
03943 
03944         PUGI__FN xml_node::iterator xml_node::end() const
03945         {
03946                 return iterator(0, _root);
03947         }
03948         
03949         PUGI__FN xml_node::attribute_iterator xml_node::attributes_begin() const
03950         {
03951                 return attribute_iterator(_root ? _root->first_attribute : 0, _root);
03952         }
03953 
03954         PUGI__FN xml_node::attribute_iterator xml_node::attributes_end() const
03955         {
03956                 return attribute_iterator(0, _root);
03957         }
03958         
03959         PUGI__FN xml_object_range<xml_node_iterator> xml_node::children() const
03960         {
03961                 return xml_object_range<xml_node_iterator>(begin(), end());
03962         }
03963 
03964         PUGI__FN xml_object_range<xml_named_node_iterator> xml_node::children(const char_t* name_) const
03965         {
03966                 return xml_object_range<xml_named_node_iterator>(xml_named_node_iterator(child(name_), name_), xml_named_node_iterator());
03967         }
03968 
03969         PUGI__FN xml_object_range<xml_attribute_iterator> xml_node::attributes() const
03970         {
03971                 return xml_object_range<xml_attribute_iterator>(attributes_begin(), attributes_end());
03972         }
03973 
03974         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::operator==(const xml_node& r) const
03975         {
03976                 return (_root == r._root);
03977         }
03978 
03979         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::operator!=(const xml_node& r) const
03980         {
03981                 return (_root != r._root);
03982         }
03983 
03984         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::operator<(const xml_node& r) const
03985         {
03986                 return (_root < r._root);
03987         }
03988         
03989         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::operator>(const xml_node& r) const
03990         {
03991                 return (_root > r._root);
03992         }
03993         
03994         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::operator<=(const xml_node& r) const
03995         {
03996                 return (_root <= r._root);
03997         }
03998         
03999         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::operator>=(const xml_node& r) const
04000         {
04001                 return (_root >= r._root);
04002         }
04003 
04004         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::empty() const
04005         {
04006                 return !_root;
04007         }
04008         
04009         PUGI__FN const char_t* xml_node::name() const
04010         {
04011                 return (_root && _root->name) ? _root->name : PUGIXML_TEXT("");
04012         }
04013 
04014         PUGI__FN xml_node_type xml_node::type() const
04015         {
04016                 return _root ? static_cast<xml_node_type>((_root->header & impl::xml_memory_page_type_mask) + 1) : node_null;
04017         }
04018         
04019         PUGI__FN const char_t* xml_node::value() const
04020         {
04021                 return (_root && _root->value) ? _root->value : PUGIXML_TEXT("");
04022         }
04023         
04024         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::child(const char_t* name_) const
04025         {
04026                 if (!_root) return xml_node();
04027 
04028                 for (xml_node_struct* i = _root->first_child; i; i = i->next_sibling)
04029                         if (i->name && impl::strequal(name_, i->name)) return xml_node(i);
04030 
04031                 return xml_node();
04032         }
04033 
04034         PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::attribute(const char_t* name_) const
04035         {
04036                 if (!_root) return xml_attribute();
04037 
04038                 for (xml_attribute_struct* i = _root->first_attribute; i; i = i->next_attribute)
04039                         if (i->name && impl::strequal(name_, i->name))
04040                                 return xml_attribute(i);
04041                 
04042                 return xml_attribute();
04043         }
04044         
04045         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::next_sibling(const char_t* name_) const
04046         {
04047                 if (!_root) return xml_node();
04048                 
04049                 for (xml_node_struct* i = _root->next_sibling; i; i = i->next_sibling)
04050                         if (i->name && impl::strequal(name_, i->name)) return xml_node(i);
04051 
04052                 return xml_node();
04053         }
04054 
04055         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::next_sibling() const
04056         {
04057                 if (!_root) return xml_node();
04058                 
04059                 if (_root->next_sibling) return xml_node(_root->next_sibling);
04060                 else return xml_node();
04061         }
04062 
04063         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::previous_sibling(const char_t* name_) const
04064         {
04065                 if (!_root) return xml_node();
04066                 
04067                 for (xml_node_struct* i = _root->prev_sibling_c; i->next_sibling; i = i->prev_sibling_c)
04068                         if (i->name && impl::strequal(name_, i->name)) return xml_node(i);
04069 
04070                 return xml_node();
04071         }
04072 
04073         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::previous_sibling() const
04074         {
04075                 if (!_root) return xml_node();
04076                 
04077                 if (_root->prev_sibling_c->next_sibling) return xml_node(_root->prev_sibling_c);
04078                 else return xml_node();
04079         }
04080 
04081         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::parent() const
04082         {
04083                 return _root ? xml_node(_root->parent) : xml_node();
04084         }
04085 
04086         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::root() const
04087         {
04088                 if (!_root) return xml_node();
04089 
04090                 impl::xml_memory_page* page = reinterpret_cast<impl::xml_memory_page*>(_root->header & impl::xml_memory_page_pointer_mask);
04091 
04092                 return xml_node(static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(page->allocator));
04093         }
04094 
04095         PUGI__FN xml_text xml_node::text() const
04096         {
04097                 return xml_text(_root);
04098         }
04099 
04100         PUGI__FN const char_t* xml_node::child_value() const
04101         {
04102                 if (!_root) return PUGIXML_TEXT("");
04103                 
04104                 for (xml_node_struct* i = _root->first_child; i; i = i->next_sibling)
04105                         if (i->value && impl::is_text_node(i))
04106                                 return i->value;
04107 
04108                 return PUGIXML_TEXT("");
04109         }
04110 
04111         PUGI__FN const char_t* xml_node::child_value(const char_t* name_) const
04112         {
04113                 return child(name_).child_value();
04114         }
04115 
04116         PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::first_attribute() const
04117         {
04118                 return _root ? xml_attribute(_root->first_attribute) : xml_attribute();
04119         }
04120 
04121         PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::last_attribute() const
04122         {
04123                 return _root && _root->first_attribute ? xml_attribute(_root->first_attribute->prev_attribute_c) : xml_attribute();
04124         }
04125 
04126         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::first_child() const
04127         {
04128                 return _root ? xml_node(_root->first_child) : xml_node();
04129         }
04130 
04131         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::last_child() const
04132         {
04133                 return _root && _root->first_child ? xml_node(_root->first_child->prev_sibling_c) : xml_node();
04134         }
04135 
04136         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::set_name(const char_t* rhs)
04137         {
04138                 switch (type())
04139                 {
04140                 case node_pi:
04141                 case node_declaration:
04142                 case node_element:
04143                         return impl::strcpy_insitu(_root->name, _root->header, impl::xml_memory_page_name_allocated_mask, rhs);
04144 
04145                 default:
04146                         return false;
04147                 }
04148         }
04149                 
04150         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::set_value(const char_t* rhs)
04151         {
04152                 switch (type())
04153                 {
04154                 case node_pi:
04155                 case node_cdata:
04156                 case node_pcdata:
04157                 case node_comment:
04158                 case node_doctype:
04159                         return impl::strcpy_insitu(_root->value, _root->header, impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask, rhs);
04160 
04161                 default:
04162                         return false;
04163                 }
04164         }
04165 
04166         PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::append_attribute(const char_t* name_)
04167         {
04168                 if (type() != node_element && type() != node_declaration) return xml_attribute();
04169                 
04170                 xml_attribute a(impl::append_attribute_ll(_root, impl::get_allocator(_root)));
04171                 a.set_name(name_);
04172                 
04173                 return a;
04174         }
04175 
04176         PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::prepend_attribute(const char_t* name_)
04177         {
04178                 if (type() != node_element && type() != node_declaration) return xml_attribute();
04179                 
04180                 xml_attribute a(impl::allocate_attribute(impl::get_allocator(_root)));
04181                 if (!a) return xml_attribute();
04182 
04183                 a.set_name(name_);
04184                 
04185                 xml_attribute_struct* head = _root->first_attribute;
04186 
04187                 if (head)
04188                 {
04189                         a._attr->prev_attribute_c = head->prev_attribute_c;
04190                         head->prev_attribute_c = a._attr;
04191                 }
04192                 else
04193                         a._attr->prev_attribute_c = a._attr;
04194                 
04195                 a._attr->next_attribute = head;
04196                 _root->first_attribute = a._attr;
04197                                 
04198                 return a;
04199         }
04200 
04201         PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::insert_attribute_before(const char_t* name_, const xml_attribute& attr)
04202         {
04203                 if ((type() != node_element && type() != node_declaration) || attr.empty()) return xml_attribute();
04204                 
04205                 // check that attribute belongs to *this
04206                 xml_attribute_struct* cur = attr._attr;
04207 
04208                 while (cur->prev_attribute_c->next_attribute) cur = cur->prev_attribute_c;
04209 
04210                 if (cur != _root->first_attribute) return xml_attribute();
04211 
04212                 xml_attribute a(impl::allocate_attribute(impl::get_allocator(_root)));
04213                 if (!a) return xml_attribute();
04214 
04215                 a.set_name(name_);
04216 
04217                 if (attr._attr->prev_attribute_c->next_attribute)
04218                         attr._attr->prev_attribute_c->next_attribute = a._attr;
04219                 else
04220                         _root->first_attribute = a._attr;
04221                 
04222                 a._attr->prev_attribute_c = attr._attr->prev_attribute_c;
04223                 a._attr->next_attribute = attr._attr;
04224                 attr._attr->prev_attribute_c = a._attr;
04225                                 
04226                 return a;
04227         }
04228 
04229         PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::insert_attribute_after(const char_t* name_, const xml_attribute& attr)
04230         {
04231                 if ((type() != node_element && type() != node_declaration) || attr.empty()) return xml_attribute();
04232                 
04233                 // check that attribute belongs to *this
04234                 xml_attribute_struct* cur = attr._attr;
04235 
04236                 while (cur->prev_attribute_c->next_attribute) cur = cur->prev_attribute_c;
04237 
04238                 if (cur != _root->first_attribute) return xml_attribute();
04239 
04240                 xml_attribute a(impl::allocate_attribute(impl::get_allocator(_root)));
04241                 if (!a) return xml_attribute();
04242 
04243                 a.set_name(name_);
04244 
04245                 if (attr._attr->next_attribute)
04246                         attr._attr->next_attribute->prev_attribute_c = a._attr;
04247                 else
04248                         _root->first_attribute->prev_attribute_c = a._attr;
04249                 
04250                 a._attr->next_attribute = attr._attr->next_attribute;
04251                 a._attr->prev_attribute_c = attr._attr;
04252                 attr._attr->next_attribute = a._attr;
04253 
04254                 return a;
04255         }
04256 
04257         PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::append_copy(const xml_attribute& proto)
04258         {
04259                 if (!proto) return xml_attribute();
04260 
04261                 xml_attribute result = append_attribute(proto.name());
04262                 result.set_value(proto.value());
04263 
04264                 return result;
04265         }
04266 
04267         PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::prepend_copy(const xml_attribute& proto)
04268         {
04269                 if (!proto) return xml_attribute();
04270 
04271                 xml_attribute result = prepend_attribute(proto.name());
04272                 result.set_value(proto.value());
04273 
04274                 return result;
04275         }
04276 
04277         PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::insert_copy_after(const xml_attribute& proto, const xml_attribute& attr)
04278         {
04279                 if (!proto) return xml_attribute();
04280 
04281                 xml_attribute result = insert_attribute_after(proto.name(), attr);
04282                 result.set_value(proto.value());
04283 
04284                 return result;
04285         }
04286 
04287         PUGI__FN xml_attribute xml_node::insert_copy_before(const xml_attribute& proto, const xml_attribute& attr)
04288         {
04289                 if (!proto) return xml_attribute();
04290 
04291                 xml_attribute result = insert_attribute_before(proto.name(), attr);
04292                 result.set_value(proto.value());
04293 
04294                 return result;
04295         }
04296 
04297         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::append_child(xml_node_type type_)
04298         {
04299                 if (!impl::allow_insert_child(this->type(), type_)) return xml_node();
04300                 
04301                 xml_node n(impl::append_node(_root, impl::get_allocator(_root), type_));
04302 
04303                 if (type_ == node_declaration) n.set_name(PUGIXML_TEXT("xml"));
04304 
04305                 return n;
04306         }
04307 
04308         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::prepend_child(xml_node_type type_)
04309         {
04310                 if (!impl::allow_insert_child(this->type(), type_)) return xml_node();
04311                 
04312                 xml_node n(impl::allocate_node(impl::get_allocator(_root), type_));
04313                 if (!n) return xml_node();
04314 
04315                 n._root->parent = _root;
04316 
04317                 xml_node_struct* head = _root->first_child;
04318 
04319                 if (head)
04320                 {
04321                         n._root->prev_sibling_c = head->prev_sibling_c;
04322                         head->prev_sibling_c = n._root;
04323                 }
04324                 else
04325                         n._root->prev_sibling_c = n._root;
04326                 
04327                 n._root->next_sibling = head;
04328                 _root->first_child = n._root;
04329                                 
04330                 if (type_ == node_declaration) n.set_name(PUGIXML_TEXT("xml"));
04331 
04332                 return n;
04333         }
04334 
04335         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::insert_child_before(xml_node_type type_, const xml_node& node)
04336         {
04337                 if (!impl::allow_insert_child(this->type(), type_)) return xml_node();
04338                 if (!node._root || node._root->parent != _root) return xml_node();
04339         
04340                 xml_node n(impl::allocate_node(impl::get_allocator(_root), type_));
04341                 if (!n) return xml_node();
04342 
04343                 n._root->parent = _root;
04344                 
04345                 if (node._root->prev_sibling_c->next_sibling)
04346                         node._root->prev_sibling_c->next_sibling = n._root;
04347                 else
04348                         _root->first_child = n._root;
04349                 
04350                 n._root->prev_sibling_c = node._root->prev_sibling_c;
04351                 n._root->next_sibling = node._root;
04352                 node._root->prev_sibling_c = n._root;
04353 
04354                 if (type_ == node_declaration) n.set_name(PUGIXML_TEXT("xml"));
04355 
04356                 return n;
04357         }
04358 
04359         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::insert_child_after(xml_node_type type_, const xml_node& node)
04360         {
04361                 if (!impl::allow_insert_child(this->type(), type_)) return xml_node();
04362                 if (!node._root || node._root->parent != _root) return xml_node();
04363         
04364                 xml_node n(impl::allocate_node(impl::get_allocator(_root), type_));
04365                 if (!n) return xml_node();
04366 
04367                 n._root->parent = _root;
04368         
04369                 if (node._root->next_sibling)
04370                         node._root->next_sibling->prev_sibling_c = n._root;
04371                 else
04372                         _root->first_child->prev_sibling_c = n._root;
04373                 
04374                 n._root->next_sibling = node._root->next_sibling;
04375                 n._root->prev_sibling_c = node._root;
04376                 node._root->next_sibling = n._root;
04377 
04378                 if (type_ == node_declaration) n.set_name(PUGIXML_TEXT("xml"));
04379 
04380                 return n;
04381         }
04382 
04383         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::append_child(const char_t* name_)
04384         {
04385                 xml_node result = append_child(node_element);
04386 
04387                 result.set_name(name_);
04388 
04389                 return result;
04390         }
04391 
04392         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::prepend_child(const char_t* name_)
04393         {
04394                 xml_node result = prepend_child(node_element);
04395 
04396                 result.set_name(name_);
04397 
04398                 return result;
04399         }
04400 
04401         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::insert_child_after(const char_t* name_, const xml_node& node)
04402         {
04403                 xml_node result = insert_child_after(node_element, node);
04404 
04405                 result.set_name(name_);
04406 
04407                 return result;
04408         }
04409 
04410         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::insert_child_before(const char_t* name_, const xml_node& node)
04411         {
04412                 xml_node result = insert_child_before(node_element, node);
04413 
04414                 result.set_name(name_);
04415 
04416                 return result;
04417         }
04418 
04419         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::append_copy(const xml_node& proto)
04420         {
04421                 xml_node result = append_child(proto.type());
04422 
04423                 if (result) impl::recursive_copy_skip(result, proto, result);
04424 
04425                 return result;
04426         }
04427 
04428         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::prepend_copy(const xml_node& proto)
04429         {
04430                 xml_node result = prepend_child(proto.type());
04431 
04432                 if (result) impl::recursive_copy_skip(result, proto, result);
04433 
04434                 return result;
04435         }
04436 
04437         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::insert_copy_after(const xml_node& proto, const xml_node& node)
04438         {
04439                 xml_node result = insert_child_after(proto.type(), node);
04440 
04441                 if (result) impl::recursive_copy_skip(result, proto, result);
04442 
04443                 return result;
04444         }
04445 
04446         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::insert_copy_before(const xml_node& proto, const xml_node& node)
04447         {
04448                 xml_node result = insert_child_before(proto.type(), node);
04449 
04450                 if (result) impl::recursive_copy_skip(result, proto, result);
04451 
04452                 return result;
04453         }
04454 
04455         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::remove_attribute(const char_t* name_)
04456         {
04457                 return remove_attribute(attribute(name_));
04458         }
04459 
04460         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::remove_attribute(const xml_attribute& a)
04461         {
04462                 if (!_root || !a._attr) return false;
04463 
04464                 // check that attribute belongs to *this
04465                 xml_attribute_struct* attr = a._attr;
04466 
04467                 while (attr->prev_attribute_c->next_attribute) attr = attr->prev_attribute_c;
04468 
04469                 if (attr != _root->first_attribute) return false;
04470 
04471                 if (a._attr->next_attribute) a._attr->next_attribute->prev_attribute_c = a._attr->prev_attribute_c;
04472                 else if (_root->first_attribute) _root->first_attribute->prev_attribute_c = a._attr->prev_attribute_c;
04473                 
04474                 if (a._attr->prev_attribute_c->next_attribute) a._attr->prev_attribute_c->next_attribute = a._attr->next_attribute;
04475                 else _root->first_attribute = a._attr->next_attribute;
04476 
04477                 impl::destroy_attribute(a._attr, impl::get_allocator(_root));
04478 
04479                 return true;
04480         }
04481 
04482         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::remove_child(const char_t* name_)
04483         {
04484                 return remove_child(child(name_));
04485         }
04486 
04487         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::remove_child(const xml_node& n)
04488         {
04489                 if (!_root || !n._root || n._root->parent != _root) return false;
04490 
04491                 if (n._root->next_sibling) n._root->next_sibling->prev_sibling_c = n._root->prev_sibling_c;
04492                 else if (_root->first_child) _root->first_child->prev_sibling_c = n._root->prev_sibling_c;
04493                 
04494                 if (n._root->prev_sibling_c->next_sibling) n._root->prev_sibling_c->next_sibling = n._root->next_sibling;
04495                 else _root->first_child = n._root->next_sibling;
04496                 
04497                 impl::destroy_node(n._root, impl::get_allocator(_root));
04498 
04499                 return true;
04500         }
04501 
04502         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::find_child_by_attribute(const char_t* name_, const char_t* attr_name, const char_t* attr_value) const
04503         {
04504                 if (!_root) return xml_node();
04505                 
04506                 for (xml_node_struct* i = _root->first_child; i; i = i->next_sibling)
04507                         if (i->name && impl::strequal(name_, i->name))
04508                         {
04509                                 for (xml_attribute_struct* a = i->first_attribute; a; a = a->next_attribute)
04510                                         if (impl::strequal(attr_name, a->name) && impl::strequal(attr_value, a->value))
04511                                                 return xml_node(i);
04512                         }
04513 
04514                 return xml_node();
04515         }
04516 
04517         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::find_child_by_attribute(const char_t* attr_name, const char_t* attr_value) const
04518         {
04519                 if (!_root) return xml_node();
04520                 
04521                 for (xml_node_struct* i = _root->first_child; i; i = i->next_sibling)
04522                         for (xml_attribute_struct* a = i->first_attribute; a; a = a->next_attribute)
04523                                 if (impl::strequal(attr_name, a->name) && impl::strequal(attr_value, a->value))
04524                                         return xml_node(i);
04525 
04526                 return xml_node();
04527         }
04528 
04529 #ifndef PUGIXML_NO_STL
04530         PUGI__FN string_t xml_node::path(char_t delimiter) const
04531         {
04532                 xml_node cursor = *this; // Make a copy.
04533                 
04534                 string_t result = cursor.name();
04535 
04536                 while (cursor.parent())
04537                 {
04538                         cursor = cursor.parent();
04539                         
04540                         string_t temp = cursor.name();
04541                         temp += delimiter;
04542                         temp += result;
04543                         result.swap(temp);
04544                 }
04545 
04546                 return result;
04547         }
04548 #endif
04549 
04550         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_node::first_element_by_path(const char_t* path_, char_t delimiter) const
04551         {
04552                 xml_node found = *this; // Current search context.
04553 
04554                 if (!_root || !path_ || !path_[0]) return found;
04555 
04556                 if (path_[0] == delimiter)
04557                 {
04558                         // Absolute path; e.g. '/foo/bar'
04559                         found = found.root();
04560                         ++path_;
04561                 }
04562 
04563                 const char_t* path_segment = path_;
04564 
04565                 while (*path_segment == delimiter) ++path_segment;
04566 
04567                 const char_t* path_segment_end = path_segment;
04568 
04569                 while (*path_segment_end && *path_segment_end != delimiter) ++path_segment_end;
04570 
04571                 if (path_segment == path_segment_end) return found;
04572 
04573                 const char_t* next_segment = path_segment_end;
04574 
04575                 while (*next_segment == delimiter) ++next_segment;
04576 
04577                 if (*path_segment == '.' && path_segment + 1 == path_segment_end)
04578                         return found.first_element_by_path(next_segment, delimiter);
04579                 else if (*path_segment == '.' && *(path_segment+1) == '.' && path_segment + 2 == path_segment_end)
04580                         return found.parent().first_element_by_path(next_segment, delimiter);
04581                 else
04582                 {
04583                         for (xml_node_struct* j = found._root->first_child; j; j = j->next_sibling)
04584                         {
04585                                 if (j->name && impl::strequalrange(j->name, path_segment, static_cast<size_t>(path_segment_end - path_segment)))
04586                                 {
04587                                         xml_node subsearch = xml_node(j).first_element_by_path(next_segment, delimiter);
04588 
04589                                         if (subsearch) return subsearch;
04590                                 }
04591                         }
04592 
04593                         return xml_node();
04594                 }
04595         }
04596 
04597         PUGI__FN bool xml_node::traverse(xml_tree_walker& walker)
04598         {
04599                 walker._depth = -1;
04600                 
04601                 xml_node arg_begin = *this;
04602                 if (!walker.begin(arg_begin)) return false;
04603 
04604                 xml_node cur = first_child();
04605                                 
04606                 if (cur)
04607                 {
04608                         ++walker._depth;
04609 
04610                         do 
04611                         {
04612                                 xml_node arg_for_each = cur;
04613                                 if (!walker.for_each(arg_for_each))
04614                                         return false;
04615                                                 
04616                                 if (cur.first_child())
04617                                 {
04618                                         ++walker._depth;
04619                                         cur = cur.first_child();
04620                                 }
04621                                 else if (cur.next_sibling())
04622                                         cur = cur.next_sibling();
04623                                 else
04624                                 {
04625                                         // Borland C++ workaround
04626                                         while (!cur.next_sibling() && cur != *this && !cur.parent().empty())
04627                                         {
04628                                                 --walker._depth;
04629                                                 cur = cur.parent();
04630                                         }
04631                                                 
04632                                         if (cur != *this)
04633                                                 cur = cur.next_sibling();
04634                                 }
04635                         }
04636                         while (cur && cur != *this);
04637                 }
04638 
04639                 assert(walker._depth == -1);
04640 
04641                 xml_node arg_end = *this;
04642                 return walker.end(arg_end);
04643         }
04644 
04645         PUGI__FN size_t xml_node::hash_value() const
04646         {
04647                 return static_cast<size_t>(reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(_root) / sizeof(xml_node_struct));
04648         }
04649 
04650         PUGI__FN xml_node_struct* xml_node::internal_object() const
04651         {
04652                 return _root;
04653         }
04654 
04655         PUGI__FN void xml_node::print(xml_writer& writer, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, xml_encoding encoding, unsigned int depth) const
04656         {
04657                 if (!_root) return;
04658 
04659                 impl::xml_buffered_writer buffered_writer(writer, encoding);
04660 
04661                 impl::node_output(buffered_writer, *this, indent, flags, depth);
04662         }
04663 
04664 #ifndef PUGIXML_NO_STL
04665         PUGI__FN void xml_node::print(std::basic_ostream<char, std::char_traits<char> >& stream, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, xml_encoding encoding, unsigned int depth) const
04666         {
04667                 xml_writer_stream writer(stream);
04668 
04669                 print(writer, indent, flags, encoding, depth);
04670         }
04671 
04672         PUGI__FN void xml_node::print(std::basic_ostream<wchar_t, std::char_traits<wchar_t> >& stream, const char_t* indent, unsigned int flags, unsigned int depth) const
04673         {
04674                 xml_writer_stream writer(stream);
04675 
04676                 print(writer, indent, flags, encoding_wchar, depth);
04677         }
04678 #endif
04679 
04680         PUGI__FN ptrdiff_t xml_node::offset_debug() const
04681         {
04682                 xml_node_struct* r = root()._root;
04683 
04684                 if (!r) return -1;
04685 
04686                 const char_t* buffer = static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(r)->buffer;
04687 
04688                 if (!buffer) return -1;
04689 
04690                 switch (type())
04691                 {
04692                 case node_document:
04693                         return 0;
04694 
04695                 case node_element:
04696                 case node_declaration:
04697                 case node_pi:
04698                         return (_root->header & impl::xml_memory_page_name_allocated_mask) ? -1 : _root->name - buffer;
04699 
04700                 case node_pcdata:
04701                 case node_cdata:
04702                 case node_comment:
04703                 case node_doctype:
04704                         return (_root->header & impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask) ? -1 : _root->value - buffer;
04705 
04706                 default:
04707                         return -1;
04708                 }
04709         }
04710 
04711 #ifdef __BORLANDC__
04712         PUGI__FN bool operator&&(const xml_node& lhs, bool rhs)
04713         {
04714                 return (bool)lhs && rhs;
04715         }
04716 
04717         PUGI__FN bool operator||(const xml_node& lhs, bool rhs)
04718         {
04719                 return (bool)lhs || rhs;
04720         }
04721 #endif
04722 
04723         PUGI__FN xml_text::xml_text(xml_node_struct* root): _root(root)
04724         {
04725         }
04726 
04727         PUGI__FN xml_node_struct* xml_text::_data() const
04728         {
04729                 if (!_root || impl::is_text_node(_root)) return _root;
04730 
04731                 for (xml_node_struct* node = _root->first_child; node; node = node->next_sibling)
04732                         if (impl::is_text_node(node))
04733                                 return node;
04734 
04735                 return 0;
04736         }
04737 
04738         PUGI__FN xml_node_struct* xml_text::_data_new()
04739         {
04740                 xml_node_struct* d = _data();
04741                 if (d) return d;
04742 
04743                 return xml_node(_root).append_child(node_pcdata).internal_object();
04744         }
04745 
04746         PUGI__FN xml_text::xml_text(): _root(0)
04747         {
04748         }
04749 
04750         PUGI__FN static void unspecified_bool_xml_text(xml_text***)
04751         {
04752         }
04753 
04754         PUGI__FN xml_text::operator xml_text::unspecified_bool_type() const
04755         {
04756                 return _data() ? unspecified_bool_xml_text : 0;
04757         }
04758 
04759         PUGI__FN bool xml_text::operator!() const
04760         {
04761                 return !_data();
04762         }
04763 
04764         PUGI__FN bool xml_text::empty() const
04765         {
04766                 return _data() == 0;
04767         }
04768 
04769         PUGI__FN const char_t* xml_text::get() const
04770         {
04771                 xml_node_struct* d = _data();
04772 
04773                 return (d && d->value) ? d->value : PUGIXML_TEXT("");
04774         }
04775 
04776         PUGI__FN const char_t* xml_text::as_string(const char_t* def) const
04777         {
04778                 xml_node_struct* d = _data();
04779 
04780                 return (d && d->value) ? d->value : def;
04781         }
04782 
04783         PUGI__FN int xml_text::as_int(int def) const
04784         {
04785                 xml_node_struct* d = _data();
04786 
04787                 return impl::get_value_int(d ? d->value : 0, def);
04788         }
04789 
04790         PUGI__FN unsigned int xml_text::as_uint(unsigned int def) const
04791         {
04792                 xml_node_struct* d = _data();
04793 
04794                 return impl::get_value_uint(d ? d->value : 0, def);
04795         }
04796 
04797         PUGI__FN double xml_text::as_double(double def) const
04798         {
04799                 xml_node_struct* d = _data();
04800 
04801                 return impl::get_value_double(d ? d->value : 0, def);
04802         }
04803 
04804         PUGI__FN float xml_text::as_float(float def) const
04805         {
04806                 xml_node_struct* d = _data();
04807 
04808                 return impl::get_value_float(d ? d->value : 0, def);
04809         }
04810 
04811         PUGI__FN bool xml_text::as_bool(bool def) const
04812         {
04813                 xml_node_struct* d = _data();
04814 
04815                 return impl::get_value_bool(d ? d->value : 0, def);
04816         }
04817 
04818         PUGI__FN bool xml_text::set(const char_t* rhs)
04819         {
04820                 xml_node_struct* dn = _data_new();
04821 
04822                 return dn ? impl::strcpy_insitu(dn->value, dn->header, impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask, rhs) : false;
04823         }
04824 
04825         PUGI__FN bool xml_text::set(int rhs)
04826         {
04827                 xml_node_struct* dn = _data_new();
04828 
04829                 return dn ? impl::set_value_convert(dn->value, dn->header, impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask, rhs) : false;
04830         }
04831 
04832         PUGI__FN bool xml_text::set(unsigned int rhs)
04833         {
04834                 xml_node_struct* dn = _data_new();
04835 
04836                 return dn ? impl::set_value_convert(dn->value, dn->header, impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask, rhs) : false;
04837         }
04838 
04839         PUGI__FN bool xml_text::set(double rhs)
04840         {
04841                 xml_node_struct* dn = _data_new();
04842 
04843                 return dn ? impl::set_value_convert(dn->value, dn->header, impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask, rhs) : false;
04844         }
04845 
04846         PUGI__FN bool xml_text::set(bool rhs)
04847         {
04848                 xml_node_struct* dn = _data_new();
04849 
04850                 return dn ? impl::set_value_convert(dn->value, dn->header, impl::xml_memory_page_value_allocated_mask, rhs) : false;
04851         }
04852 
04853         PUGI__FN xml_text& xml_text::operator=(const char_t* rhs)
04854         {
04855                 set(rhs);
04856                 return *this;
04857         }
04858 
04859         PUGI__FN xml_text& xml_text::operator=(int rhs)
04860         {
04861                 set(rhs);
04862                 return *this;
04863         }
04864 
04865         PUGI__FN xml_text& xml_text::operator=(unsigned int rhs)
04866         {
04867                 set(rhs);
04868                 return *this;
04869         }
04870 
04871         PUGI__FN xml_text& xml_text::operator=(double rhs)
04872         {
04873                 set(rhs);
04874                 return *this;
04875         }
04876 
04877         PUGI__FN xml_text& xml_text::operator=(bool rhs)
04878         {
04879                 set(rhs);
04880                 return *this;
04881         }
04882 
04883         PUGI__FN xml_node xml_text::data() const
04884         {
04885                 return xml_node(_data());
04886         }
04887 
04888 #ifdef __BORLANDC__
04889         PUGI__FN bool operator&&(const xml_text& lhs, bool rhs)
04890         {
04891                 return (bool)lhs && rhs;
04892         }
04893 
04894         PUGI__FN bool operator||(const xml_text& lhs, bool rhs)
04895         {
04896                 return (bool)lhs || rhs;
04897         }
04898 #endif
04899 
04900         PUGI__FN xml_node_iterator::xml_node_iterator()
04901         {
04902         }
04903 
04904         PUGI__FN xml_node_iterator::xml_node_iterator(const xml_node& node): _wrap(node), _parent(node.parent())
04905         {
04906         }
04907 
04908         PUGI__FN xml_node_iterator::xml_node_iterator(xml_node_struct* ref, xml_node_struct* parent): _wrap(ref), _parent(parent)
04909         {
04910         }
04911 
04912         PUGI__FN bool xml_node_iterator::operator==(const xml_node_iterator& rhs) const
04913         {
04914                 return _wrap._root == rhs._wrap._root && _parent._root == rhs._parent._root;
04915         }
04916         
04917         PUGI__FN bool xml_node_iterator::operator!=(const xml_node_iterator& rhs) const
04918         {
04919                 return _wrap._root != rhs._wrap._root || _parent._root != rhs._parent._root;
04920         }
04921 
04922         PUGI__FN xml_node& xml_node_iterator::operator*() const
04923         {
04924                 assert(_wrap._root);
04925                 return _wrap;
04926         }
04927 
04928         PUGI__FN xml_node* xml_node_iterator::operator->() const
04929         {
04930                 assert(_wrap._root);
04931                 return const_cast<xml_node*>(&_wrap); // BCC32 workaround
04932         }
04933 
04934         PUGI__FN const xml_node_iterator& xml_node_iterator::operator++()
04935         {
04936                 assert(_wrap._root);
04937                 _wrap._root = _wrap._root->next_sibling;
04938                 return *this;
04939         }
04940 
04941         PUGI__FN xml_node_iterator xml_node_iterator::operator++(int)
04942         {
04943                 xml_node_iterator temp = *this;
04944                 ++*this;
04945                 return temp;
04946         }
04947 
04948         PUGI__FN const xml_node_iterator& xml_node_iterator::operator--()
04949         {
04950                 _wrap = _wrap._root ? _wrap.previous_sibling() : _parent.last_child();
04951                 return *this;
04952         }
04953 
04954         PUGI__FN xml_node_iterator xml_node_iterator::operator--(int)
04955         {
04956                 xml_node_iterator temp = *this;
04957                 --*this;
04958                 return temp;
04959         }
04960 
04961         PUGI__FN xml_attribute_iterator::xml_attribute_iterator()
04962         {
04963         }
04964 
04965         PUGI__FN xml_attribute_iterator::xml_attribute_iterator(const xml_attribute& attr, const xml_node& parent): _wrap(attr), _parent(parent)
04966         {
04967         }
04968 
04969         PUGI__FN xml_attribute_iterator::xml_attribute_iterator(xml_attribute_struct* ref, xml_node_struct* parent): _wrap(ref), _parent(parent)
04970         {
04971         }
04972 
04973         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute_iterator::operator==(const xml_attribute_iterator& rhs) const
04974         {
04975                 return _wrap._attr == rhs._wrap._attr && _parent._root == rhs._parent._root;
04976         }
04977         
04978         PUGI__FN bool xml_attribute_iterator::operator!=(const xml_attribute_iterator& rhs) const
04979         {
04980                 return _wrap._attr != rhs._wrap._attr || _parent._root != rhs._parent._root;
04981         }
04982 
04983         PUGI__FN xml_attribute& xml_attribute_iterator::operator*() const
04984         {
04985                 assert(_wrap._attr);
04986                 return _wrap;
04987         }
04988 
04989         PUGI__FN xml_attribute* xml_attribute_iterator::operator->() const
04990         {
04991                 assert(_wrap._attr);
04992                 return const_cast<xml_attribute*>(&_wrap); // BCC32 workaround
04993         }
04994 
04995         PUGI__FN const xml_attribute_iterator& xml_attribute_iterator::operator++()
04996         {
04997                 assert(_wrap._attr);
04998                 _wrap._attr = _wrap._attr->next_attribute;
04999                 return *this;
05000         }
05001 
05002         PUGI__FN xml_attribute_iterator xml_attribute_iterator::operator++(int)
05003         {
05004                 xml_attribute_iterator temp = *this;
05005                 ++*this;
05006                 return temp;
05007         }
05008 
05009         PUGI__FN const xml_attribute_iterator& xml_attribute_iterator::operator--()
05010         {
05011                 _wrap = _wrap._attr ? _wrap.previous_attribute() : _parent.last_attribute();
05012                 return *this;
05013         }
05014 
05015         PUGI__FN xml_attribute_iterator xml_attribute_iterator::operator--(int)
05016         {
05017                 xml_attribute_iterator temp = *this;
05018                 --*this;
05019                 return temp;
05020         }
05021 
05022         PUGI__FN xml_named_node_iterator::xml_named_node_iterator(): _name(0)
05023         {
05024         }
05025 
05026         PUGI__FN xml_named_node_iterator::xml_named_node_iterator(const xml_node& node, const char_t* name): _node(node), _name(name)
05027         {
05028         }
05029 
05030         PUGI__FN bool xml_named_node_iterator::operator==(const xml_named_node_iterator& rhs) const
05031         {
05032                 return _node == rhs._node;
05033         }
05034 
05035         PUGI__FN bool xml_named_node_iterator::operator!=(const xml_named_node_iterator& rhs) const
05036         {
05037                 return _node != rhs._node;
05038         }
05039 
05040         PUGI__FN xml_node& xml_named_node_iterator::operator*() const
05041         {
05042                 assert(_node._root);
05043                 return _node;
05044         }
05045 
05046         PUGI__FN xml_node* xml_named_node_iterator::operator->() const
05047         {
05048                 assert(_node._root);
05049                 return const_cast<xml_node*>(&_node); // BCC32 workaround
05050         }
05051 
05052         PUGI__FN const xml_named_node_iterator& xml_named_node_iterator::operator++()
05053         {
05054                 assert(_node._root);
05055                 _node = _node.next_sibling(_name);
05056                 return *this;
05057         }
05058 
05059         PUGI__FN xml_named_node_iterator xml_named_node_iterator::operator++(int)
05060         {
05061                 xml_named_node_iterator temp = *this;
05062                 ++*this;
05063                 return temp;
05064         }
05065 
05066         PUGI__FN xml_parse_result::xml_parse_result(): status(status_internal_error), offset(0), encoding(encoding_auto)
05067         {
05068         }
05069 
05070         PUGI__FN xml_parse_result::operator bool() const
05071         {
05072                 return status == status_ok;
05073         }
05074 
05075         PUGI__FN const char* xml_parse_result::description() const
05076         {
05077                 switch (status)
05078                 {
05079                 case status_ok: return "No error";
05080 
05081                 case status_file_not_found: return "File was not found";
05082                 case status_io_error: return "Error reading from file/stream";
05083                 case status_out_of_memory: return "Could not allocate memory";
05084                 case status_internal_error: return "Internal error occurred";
05085 
05086                 case status_unrecognized_tag: return "Could not determine tag type";
05087 
05088                 case status_bad_pi: return "Error parsing document declaration/processing instruction";
05089                 case status_bad_comment: return "Error parsing comment";
05090                 case status_bad_cdata: return "Error parsing CDATA section";
05091                 case status_bad_doctype: return "Error parsing document type declaration";
05092                 case status_bad_pcdata: return "Error parsing PCDATA section";
05093                 case status_bad_start_element: return "Error parsing start element tag";
05094                 case status_bad_attribute: return "Error parsing element attribute";
05095                 case status_bad_end_element: return "Error parsing end element tag";
05096                 case status_end_element_mismatch: return "Start-end tags mismatch";
05097 
05098                 default: return "Unknown error";
05099                 }
05100         }
05101 
05102         PUGI__FN xml_document::xml_document(): _buffer(0)
05103         {
05104                 create();
05105         }
05106 
05107         PUGI__FN xml_document::~xml_document()
05108         {
05109                 destroy();
05110         }
05111 
05112         PUGI__FN void xml_document::reset()
05113         {
05114                 destroy();
05115                 create();
05116         }
05117 
05118         PUGI__FN void xml_document::reset(const xml_document& proto)
05119         {
05120                 reset();
05121 
05122                 for (xml_node cur = proto.first_child(); cur; cur = cur.next_sibling())
05123                         append_copy(cur);
05124         }
05125 
05126         PUGI__FN void xml_document::create()
05127         {
05128                 // initialize sentinel page
05129                 PUGI__STATIC_ASSERT(offsetof(impl::xml_memory_page, data) + sizeof(impl::xml_document_struct) + impl::xml_memory_page_alignment <= sizeof(_memory));
05130 
05131                 // align upwards to page boundary
05132                 void* page_memory = reinterpret_cast<void*>((reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(_memory) + (impl::xml_memory_page_alignment - 1)) & ~(impl::xml_memory_page_alignment - 1));
05133 
05134                 // prepare page structure
05135                 impl::xml_memory_page* page = impl::xml_memory_page::construct(page_memory);
05136 
05137                 page->busy_size = impl::xml_memory_page_size;
05138 
05139                 // allocate new root
05140                 _root = new (page->data) impl::xml_document_struct(page);
05141                 _root->prev_sibling_c = _root;
05142 
05143                 // setup sentinel page
05144                 page->allocator = static_cast<impl::xml_document_struct*>(_root);
05145         }
05146 
05147         PUGI__FN void xml_document::destroy()
05148         {
05149                 // destroy static storage
05150                 if (_buffer)
05151                 {
05152                         impl::xml_memory::deallocate(_buffer);
05153                         _buffer = 0;
05154                 }
05155 
05156                 // destroy dynamic storage, leave sentinel page (it's in static memory)
05157                 if (_root)
05158                 {
05159                         impl::xml_memory_page* root_page = reinterpret_cast<impl::xml_memory_page*>(_root->header & impl::xml_memory_page_pointer_mask);
05160                         assert(root_page && !root_page->prev && !root_page->memory);
05161 
05162                         // destroy all pages
05163                         for (impl::xml_memory_page* page = root_page->next; page; )
05164                         {
05165                                 impl::xml_memory_page* next = page->next;
05166 
05167                                 impl::xml_allocator::deallocate_page(page);
05168 
05169                                 page = next;
05170                         }
05171 
05172                         // cleanup root page
05173                         root_page->allocator = 0;
05174                         root_page->next = 0;
05175                         root_page->busy_size = root_page->freed_size = 0;
05176 
05177                         _root = 0;
05178                 }
05179         }
05180 
05181 #ifndef PUGIXML_NO_STL
